Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • State
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<State>

    public class State
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<State>
    Stores the properties of a single state, including the lines not yet drawn, the actions taken to get to the state, pen position and the cost. In charge of generating the states accessible from this state.
    Author:
    Raph

      java.util.ArrayList<State> genStates()
      Generates possible state reachable after one action from this state(one move followed by a draw)

      Gets the total cost/distance moved of the pen to get to this state
